verse: Another Sabbath Day came and Jesus was invited to an official’s home for a meal. This fellow was a leader of the Pharisees, and Jesus was still under close surveillance by them.
Jesus noticed a man suffering from a swelling disorder.
He questioned the religious scholars and Pharisees.
They didn’t reply. Then Jesus healed the man and sent him on his way.
Then He noticed how the guests were jockeying for places of honor at the dinner, so He gave them advice.
Jesus still wasn’t finished. Now He turned to the host who had invited Him to this gathering.
Great crowds joined Him on His journey, and He turned to them.
